subtitle: A lovely lunch or enjoy on a picnic.

method.text: Place the turkey fillets in a frying pan. Pour over the wine and stock. Season. Heat so the turkey poaches in a gently simmering stock for 15 min. Allow to cool in the liquid.
Lift out the turkey. Cut into 2 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm chunks. Put into the bottom of the salad bowl.
Trim and slice the mushrooms, leaving small mushrooms whole. Add to the bowl.
Add salad leaves to the bowl.
If taking on a picnic, cover the bowl and refrigerate until departure.
Make up the dressing in a small screw-top jar. Shake and pour on the salad just before serving. Toss all the ingredients together.

title: Turkey and mushroom salad
